alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 06 at 8:53AM MST until January 06 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional ice accumulations up to 1/4 inch. * WHERE...Judith Basin County and Judith Gap and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Many roads across the area are impassable and closed. Please heed all travel restrictions and road closures.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Western and Central Chouteau County
